001package Tools;
002
003import java.awt.Graphics2D;
004import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
005import java.awt.color.ICC_Profile;
006import java.io.FileOutputStream;
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.nio.file.Path;
009import java.nio.file.Paths;
010
011import com.lowagie.text.Document;
012import com.lowagie.text.DocumentException;
013import com.lowagie.text.Rectangle;
014import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfContentByte;
015import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfGraphics2D;
016import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfWriter;
017
018import ij.IJ;
019import ij.ImagePlus;
020import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
021import ij.gui.Overlay;
022import ij.gui.Roi;
023import ij.io.SaveDialog;
024import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
025import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
026
027
028/**
029 * This ImageJ plugin exports the current image and its attached
030 * vector graphic overlay (if existent) as a PDF file.
031 * It uses the free OpenPDF library, which is based on iText4 but LGPL-licensed
032 * (see <a href="https://github.com/LibrePDF/OpenPDF">
033 * https://github.com/LibrePDF/OpenPDF</a>).
034 * 
035 * @author W. Burger
036 * @version 2021/04/05 (migrated to OpenPDF, added image properties)
037 */
038public class Export_PDF_With_Overlay implements PlugInFilter {
039        
040        private static boolean IncludeImage = true;
041        private static boolean IncludeOverlay = true;
042        private static boolean IncludeImageProps = true;
043        private static int ImageUpscaleFactor = 1;
044        
045        /**
046         * Set true to have a default ICC profile (sRGB) added
047         * to the PDF file. Solves problems with viewing
048         * files in Acrobat X+.
049         */
050        private static boolean AddIccProfile = true;
051
052        /**
053         * Used to draw graphic strokes with zero stroke width.
054         */
055        private static double DefaultStrokeWidth = 0.01;                // substitute for zero-width strokes
056        private static String DefaultFileExtension = ".pdf";
057        private static String CurrentOutputDirectory = IJ.getDirectory("temp");
058        
059        private ImagePlus img;
060
061        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus img) {
062                this.img = img;
063                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
064        }
065
066        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
067                if (!verifyPdfLib()) {
068                        return;
069                }
070                
071                if (img.getStackSize() != 1) {
072                        IJ.error("Can only export single images (no stacks)!");
073                        return;
074                }
075                
076                if (!getUserInput()) {
077                        return;
078                }
079                
080                String dir = CurrentOutputDirectory;
081                String name = stripFileExtension(img.getShortTitle());
082                if (ImageUpscaleFactor > 1) {
083                        name = name + "x" + ImageUpscaleFactor;
084                }
085                
086                Path path = askForFilePath(dir, name, "Save as PDF");
087                if (path == null) {
088                        return;
089                }
090                
091                IJ.log("path = " + path);
092
093                String finalPath = createPdf(img, ImageUpscaleFactor, path);
094                if (finalPath == null) 
095                        IJ.log("PDF export failed");
096                else
097                        IJ.log("PDF exported to " + finalPath);
098        }
099        
100        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
101        
102        /**
103         * Saves a PDF of the input image.
104         * @param im input image of type {@link ij.ImagePlus}, possibly with attached vector overlay
105         * @param upscale scale factor (must be greater than 0)
106         * @param path complete path to the created PDF file
107         * @return
108         */
109        private String createPdf(ImagePlus im, int upscale, Path path) {
110                final int width  = im.getWidth();       // original image size
111                final int height = im.getHeight();
112                Overlay overlay = im.getOverlay();      // original overlay (if any)
113                
114                // step 1: create the PDF document
115                Rectangle pageSize = new Rectangle(width, height);
116                Document document = new Document(pageSize);
117                
118                try {
119                        // step 2: create a PDF writer
120                        PdfWriter writer = PdfWriter.getInstance(document, new FileOutputStream(path.toFile()));
121                        
122                        // step 3: open the document
123                        document.open();
124                        
125                        // step 4: create a template and the associated Graphics2D context
126                        PdfContentByte cb = writer.getDirectContent();
127                        
128                        // optional: set sRGB default viewing profile
129                        if (AddIccProfile) {
130                                ICC_Profile colorProfile = ICC_Profile.getInstance(ColorSpace.CS_sRGB);
131                                writer.setOutputIntents("Custom", null, "http://www.color.org", "sRGB IEC61966-2.1", colorProfile);
132                                //byte[] iccdata = java.awt.color.ICC_Profile.getInstance(ColorSpace.CS_sRGB).getData();
133                                //com.itextpdf.text.pdf.ICC_Profile icc = com.itextpdf.text.pdf.ICC_Profile.getInstance(iccdata);
134                                //writer.setOutputIntents("Custom", null, "http://www.color.org", "sRGB IEC61966-2.1", icc);
135                        }
136                                                
137                        // insert the image
138                        if (IncludeImage) {
139                                if (upscale > 1) {      // upscale the image if needed (without interpolation)
140                                        im = im.resize(width * upscale, height * upscale, "none");
141                                }
142                                IJ.log("exporting image of size " + im.getWidth() + "/" + im.getHeight());
143                                com.lowagie.text.Image pdfImg = com.lowagie.text.Image.getInstance(im.getImage(), null);
144                                pdfImg.setAbsolutePosition(0, 0);
145                                pdfImg.scaleToFit(width, height);       // fit to the original size             
146                                cb.addImage(pdfImg);
147                        }
148                        
149                        // optional: draw the vector overlay
150                        if (overlay != null && IncludeOverlay) {
151                                IJ.log("exporting overlay");
152                                Graphics2D g2 = new PdfGraphics2D(cb, width, height);
153                                Roi[] roiArr = overlay.toArray();
154                                for (Roi roi : roiArr) {
155                                        float sw = roi.getStrokeWidth();
156                                        if (sw < 0.001f) {      // sometimes stroke width is simply not set (= 0)
157                                                roi.setStrokeWidth(DefaultStrokeWidth); // temporarily change stroke width
158                                        }
159                                        ImagePlus tmpIm = roi.getImage();
160                                        roi.setImage(null);     // trick learned from Wayne to ensure magnification is 1
161                                        roi.drawOverlay(g2);    // replacement (recomm. by Wayne)
162                                        roi.setImage(tmpIm);
163                                        roi.setStrokeWidth(sw); // restore original stroke width
164                                }
165                                g2.dispose();
166                        }
167                        
168                        // optional: copy ImagePlus custom properties to PDF
169                        if (IncludeImageProps) {
170                                String[] props = im.getPropertiesAsArray();
171                                if (props != null) {
172                                        for (int i = 0; i < props.length; i+=2) {
173                                                String key = props[i];
174                                                String val = props[i + 1];
175                                                document.addHeader(key, val);
176                                        }
177                                }
178                        }
179                        
180                } catch (DocumentException de) {
181                        IJ.log(de.getMessage());
182                } catch (IOException ioe) {
183                        IJ.log(ioe.getMessage());
184                }
185                
186                // step 5: close the document
187                document.close();
188                return path.toString();
189        }
190        
191        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
192        
193        private boolean getUserInput() {
194                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
195                
196                gd.addCheckbox("Include overlay", IncludeOverlay);
197                gd.addCheckbox("Include image", IncludeImage);
198                gd.addCheckbox("Include image meta-data", IncludeImageProps);
199                gd.addCheckbox("Add sRGB ICC profile", AddIccProfile);
200                gd.addNumericField("Image upscale factor", ImageUpscaleFactor, 0);
201                
202                gd.showDialog();
203                if (gd.wasCanceled())
204                        return false;
205                
206                IncludeOverlay = gd.getNextBoolean();
207                IncludeImage = gd.getNextBoolean();
208                IncludeImageProps = gd.getNextBoolean();
209                AddIccProfile = gd.getNextBoolean();
210                ImageUpscaleFactor = Math.max((int) gd.getNextNumber(), 1);
211                return true;
212        }
213        
214        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
215        
216    private Path askForFilePath(String dir, String name, String title) {
217        SaveDialog od = new SaveDialog(title, dir, name, DefaultFileExtension);
218        dir  = od.getDirectory();
219        name = od.getFileName();
220        
221        if(name != null) {
222                CurrentOutputDirectory = dir;
223                return Paths.get(dir, name);
224        }
225        else
226                return null;
227    }
228        
229        private String stripFileExtension(String fileName) {
230                int dotInd = fileName.lastIndexOf('.');
231                // if dot is in the first position,
232                // we are dealing with a hidden file rather than a DefaultFileExtension
233                return (dotInd > 0) ? fileName.substring(0, dotInd) : fileName;
234        }
235        
236        
237        private boolean verifyPdfLib() {
238                try {
239                        if (Class.forName("com.lowagie.text.Document") != null) {
240                                return true;
241                        }
242                } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) { }
243                IJ.error("This plugin requires LibrePDF/OpenPDF to be installed!\n" +
244                                "see https://github.com/LibrePDF/OpenPDF\n");
245                return false;
246        }
247}
248
